resources.string: If you would like to delete your profile, input your email and password and press Delete Profile

G-tracker is a device capable of measuring how full a garbage can is and transmitting it onto an application where users (employees) can consult to know which garbage bin needs changing. It also acts as a data collection for a commercial area to potentially modify the location of garbage cans that are often empty, or add garbage cans to locations where they are often full. It is a project born out of Concordia University in Montreal, Canada by 6 computer and electrical engineers. Our hopes are that this project will facilitate the job of all cleaning personel and further keep the world clean. Let us know if you have any questions or suggestions by contacting us through our contact us page.
If you have any questions, comments, suggestions or business inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at:
